You can use the DomainSensitiveFrontier and set the "max-docs" parameter 
in the Frontier settings to the maximum number from each website.

Rob.

> download more than 10 pages from each (www)?\.[^\.]+\.de domain (or, if
> that is not possible, where I do not download more than 10 pages from the
> same IP).
